import React from 'react'; const Appraisals: React.FC = () => { return (

Appraisals

{/* Sample Appraisal Cards */}

Annual Review 2024

John Doe

Pending

Due: March 15, 2024

Manager: Jane Smith

Mid-Year Review 2023

Bob Johnson

Completed

Completed: July 1, 2023

Manager: Jane Smith

); }; export default Appraisals;
